name: Bestiary of Danzi (Mosslight Games)
description:
Play as a mystic, who has been invited to aid a village that's been mysteriously suffering attacks from demonic beasts.

You can collect qi and expel it to jump in the air (you can jump up to four times consecutively) and glide. Find and awaken guardians at their statues using their respective talismans, and guide them to the demonic beasts they can pacify in order to save the village from their wrath. Discover the hidden tale behind these attacks along the way.

Each action using qi requires 3 qi particles (these are small, floating objects).

Controls: WASD - move (hold Left Shift whilst on the ground to run) Space - jump (hold Left Shift whilst in the air to glide) E - pick up/drop object R - throw object (throwable objects are purple) Esc - exit game

For more information/updates on the game: Check out our Twitter & Instagram: @mosslightgames
